resources.string: Display an ongoing notification about background service running
Get an insight into how your screen unlocks influence your usage habits and make your relation with the smartphone more efficient and healthy!
UnlockMaster gathers data about your device unlocks to bring you these core values:
Constant screen usage control via mobilizing notifications.
Insightful and visually attractive data about your smartphone usage.
More healthy and efficient relationship with your device.
Before you start using UnlockMaster you have to set up your unlock limit:
Unlock limit is a number of unlocks that you don’t want to exceed during the day.
Unlock limit can be adjusted to meet your improving smartphone usage standards.
Note: reaching your unlock limit will NOT prevent you from unlocking your screen.
Allow UnlockMaster to fully work in background

UnlockMaster constantly works in background to gather your device unlocks. Some mobile phone manufacturers impose restrictions on background work by killing working applications. In order to prevent this behavior please visit the dontkillmyapp.com website and follow instructions for your smartphone manufacturer:

UnlockMaster is designed to send you mobilizing notifications and remind you about your daily unlocks with a persistent notification. This requires the app to have the permission to post notifications. Make sure you grant that permission before continuing:
Select your phone manufacturer and follow the instructions provided.
Notifications permission is denied. Click to enable.
Notifications permission is granted. Good job!
Notifications permission is crucial for UnlockMaster to function properly. Go to settings in order to grant it.
All set, you’re ready to go!
Now UnlockMaster will constantly work for you and help you improve your smartphone usage habits! You can know that UnlockMaster is working when you see notification like this one:
UnlockMaster will cyclically post popping-off notifications reminding you of your goals and to prevent unnecessary smartphone usage:
UnlockMaster will remind you to check on your progress and set new goals every evening by posting daily wrap-up notifications:
Note: you can always change the frequency and time of those notifications in the settings.
You can change your unlock limit to better suit your smartphone usage style. The new unlock limit will take effect tomorrow:
New unlock limit is already set for tomorrow:
Are you sure you want to cancel the new unlock limit that would take effect tomorrow?
This is how your daily unlock count looked like over the last week:
Are you sure you want to pause the counter? Phone unlocks, screen time etc. won’t be recorded when the counter is paused.

Screen On event is a situation when the screen of your smartphone is lit up (turned on). It can happen e.g. after a notification is received or power button is pressed. This event does not necessarily mean that the phone was unlocked.
Line chart with a magnifying glass icon
Notification indicating working background service image
Notification reminding about daily wrap-up image
